mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.selectCustomerInfo] 20190916 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT TYPE_ID , CUST_ID , NAME , TYPE_ID_NAME , ADDR , POSTCODE , CUST_VA_NO , NATION_NAME , RACE_ID_NAME , TEL_M1 , TEL_O , TEL_R , EMAIL , CUST_CNTC_ID FROM ( SELECT A.TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID , A.CUST_ID AS CUST_ID , A.NAME AS NAME , CASE WHEN LEFT_A.CODE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN D.CODE_NAME||'('||LEFT_A.CODE_NAME||')' ELSE D.CODE_NAME END AS TYPE_ID_NAME , B.ADDR_DTL ||' '|| NVL(B.STREET, '') ||' '|| NVL(C.AREA, '') ||' '|| NVL(C.POSTCODE, '') ||' '|| NVL(C.CITY,'') ||' '|| NVL(C.STATE,'') ||' '|| NVL(C.COUNTRY,'') AS ADDR , C.POSTCODE AS POSTCODE , A.CUST_VA_NO AS CUST_VA_NO , LEFT_B.NAME AS NATION_NAME , LEFT_C.CODE_NAME AS RACE_ID_NAME , E.TEL_M1 AS TEL_M1 , E.TEL_O AS TEL_O , E.TEL_R AS TEL_R , E.EMAIL AS EMAIL , E.CUST_CNTC_ID AS CUST_CNTC_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY E.CUST_ID ORDER BY E.CUST_CNTC_ID DESC) AS ROW_NUMBER FROM SAL0029D A -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : Customer INNER JOIN SAL0023D B -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustAddress ON A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND B.STUS_CODE_ID = 9 --9(MAIN) INNER JOIN SYS0064M C ON B.AREA_ID = C.AREA_ID INNER JOIN SYS0013M D ON A.TYPE_ID = D.CODE_ID INNER JOIN SAL0027D E ON A.CUST_ID = E.CUST_ID AND E.STUS_CODE_ID = 9 --9(MAIN) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M LEFT_A ON A.CORP_TYPE_ID = LEFT_A.CODE_ID AND A.CORP_TYPE_ID != 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0015M LEFT_B ON A.NATION = LEFT_B.CNTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M LEFT_C ON A.RACE_ID = LEFT_C.CODE_ID WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND B.CUST_ADD_ID = #{custAddId} ) WHERE ROW_NUMBER = 1

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.selectCustomerOrder] 20190916 - KR JAEMAJEM */
SELECT A.SALES_ORD_ID AS SALES_ORD_ID , C.NAME AS NAME , TO_CHAR(A.SALES_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS SALES_DT , D.NAME AS STUS_CODE_ID_NAME , E.ADDR_DTL ||' '|| NVL(E.STREET, '') ||' '|| NVL(F.AREA, '') ||' '|| NVL(F.POSTCODE, '') ||' '|| NVL(F.CITY,'') ||' '|| NVL(F.STATE,'') ||' '|| NVL(F.COUNTRY,'') AS ADDR , G.CODE_NAME AS APP_TYPE_ID_NAME , G.STK_DESC AS STK_DESC_NAME FROM SAL0001D A --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : SalesOrderM INNER JOIN SAL0045D B --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : Installation ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID INNER JOIN SAL0027D C --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustContact ON B.CNT_ID = C.CUST_CNTC_ID INNER JOIN SYS0038M D --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : StatusCode ON A.STUS_CODE_ID = D.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAL0023D E --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustAddress ON B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0064M F --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : Magic Address(GeoPC_Streets) ON E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID INNER JOIN SYS0013M G --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CodeDetail ON A.APP_TYPE_ID = G.CODE_ID INNER JOIN SAL0002D H --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : SalesOrderD ON A.SALES_ORD_ID = H.SALES_ORD_ID INNER JOIN SYS0026M G --ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : InvStock ON H.ITM_STK_ID = G.STK_ID WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} ORDER BY A.SALES_DT DESC

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.selectCodeList] 20190916 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT CODE_MASTER_ID , CODE_ID , CODE , CODE_NAME , CODE_DESC FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID IN (8, 95, 17, 338, 2) AND DISAB = 0 ORDER BY CODE_MASTER_ID ASC , CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID = 8 THEN CODE_DESC ELSE NULL END DESC , CASE WHEN CODE_MASTER_ID != 8 THEN CODE_DESC ELSE NULL END ASC

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.selectTelCheck] 20190916 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ORG0001D WHERE MEM_TYPE IN (1,2) AND '0342809553' IN (TEL_OFFICE, TEL_HUSE, TEL_MOBILE)
mapper.insert:
SELECT SAL0029D_CUST_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS custId FROM DUAL
/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.insertCustomer] 20190919 - KR JAEMAJEM */ INSERT INTO SAL0029D -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : Customer ( CUST_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustomerID , NAME -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , NRIC -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , NATION -- ASIS_COLUMN : Nationality , DOB -- ASIS_COLUMN : DOB , GENDER -- ASIS_COLUMN : Gender , RACE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : RaceID , EMAIL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , REM -- ASIS_COLUMN : Remark , STUS_CODE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID , UPD_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , UPD_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , REN_GRP -- ASIS_COLUMN : RenGrp , PST_TERMS -- ASIS_COLUMN : PSTTerms , ID_OLD -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , CRT_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , CRT_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , TYPE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : TypeID , PAS_SPORT_EXPR -- ASIS_COLUMN : PassportExpire , VISA_EXPR -- ASIS_COLUMN : VisaExpire , CUST_VA_NO -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustVano , CORP_TYPE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CorpTypeID , GST_RGIST_NO -- ASIS_COLUMN : GSTRegistrationNo , CTOS_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : CTOSDate , FICO_SCRE -- ASIS_COLUMN : FicoScore , OLD_IC --Old IC )VALUES( #{custId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustomerID , #{name} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , #{nric} -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , NVL(#{nation}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : Nationality , TO_DATE(NVL(#{dob}, '1900/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') -- ASIS_COLUMN : DOB , #{gender} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Gender , NVL(#{raceId}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : RaceID , #{email} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , #{rem} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Remark , 1 -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID -- SYS0038M : 1(Active) , #{updUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : RenGrp , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : PSTTerms , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , #{crtUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , #{typeId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TypeID , TO_DATE(NVL(#{pasSportExpr}, '1900/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') -- ASIS_COLUMN : PassportExpire , TO_DATE(NVL(#{visaExpr}, '1900/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') -- ASIS_COLUMN : VisaExpire , '98 9920 '||SUBSTR(LPAD(#{custId}, 8, 0), 1,4)||' '||SUBSTR(LPAD(#{custId}, 8, 0),5)-- ASIS_COLUMN : CustVano , DECODE(#{typeId}, 965, #{corpTypeId}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : CorpTypeID , #{gstRgistNo} -- ASIS_COLUMN : GSTRegistrationNo , #{ctosDt} -- ASIS_COLUMN : CTOSDate , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : FicoScore , #{oldIc} --Old IC )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.insertCustContact] 20190919 - KR JAEMAJEM */ INSERT INTO SAL0027D -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustContact ( CUST_CNTC_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustContactID , CUST_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustID , NAME -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , CUST_INITIAL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Initial , NRIC -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , POS -- ASIS_COLUMN : Pos , TEL_M1 -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM1 , TEL_M2 -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM2 , TEL_O -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelO , TEL_R -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelR , TELF -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelF , DOB -- ASIS_COLUMN : DOB , GENDER -- ASIS_COLUMN : Gender , RACE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : RaceID , EMAIL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , STUS_CODE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID , UPD_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , UPD_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , ID_OLD -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , DEPT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Dept , DCM -- ASIS_COLUMN : Dcm , CRT_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , CRT_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , EXT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Ext )VALUES( SAL0027D_CUST_CNTC_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustContactID , #{custId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustID , #{contactName} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , NVL(#{contactCustInitial}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : Initial , #{contactNric} -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Pos , #{contactTelM1} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM1 , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM2 , #{contactTelO} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelO , #{contactTelR} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelR , #{contactTelf} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelF , TO_DATE(NVL(#{contactDob}, '1900/01/01'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') -- ASIS_COLUMN : DOB , #{contactGender} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Gender , NVL(#{contactRaceId}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : RaceID , #{contactEmail} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , 9 -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID -- SYS0038M : 9(Main) , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , #{updUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Dept , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : Dcm , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , #{crtUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , #{contactExt} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Ext )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customerApi.impl.CustomerApiMapper.insertCustCareContact] 20190919 - KR JAEMAJEM */ INSERT INTO SAL0026D -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustCareContact ( CUST_CARE_CNT_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustCareCntID , CUST_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustID , NAME -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , CUST_INITIAL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Initial , TEL_M -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM , TEL_O -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelO , TEL_R -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelR , EXT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Ext , EMAIL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , STUS_CODE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID , CRT_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , CRT_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , UPD_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , UPD_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , TELF -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelF )VALUES( SAL0026D_CUST_CARE_CNT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustCareCntID , #{custId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustID , #{careCntName} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Name , NVL(#{careCntCustInitial}, 0) -- ASIS_COLUMN : Initial , #{careCntTelM} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelM , #{careCntTelO} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelO , #{careCntTelR} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelR , #{careCntExt} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Ext , #{careCntEmail} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Email , 9 -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID -- SYS0038M : 9(Main) , #{crtUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , #{updUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , #{careCntTelf} -- ASIS_COLUMN : TelF )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.customer.impl.CustomerApiMapper.insertCustAddress] 20190919 - KR JAEMAJEM */ INSERT INTO SAL0023D -- ASIS_DB : WebDB ASIS_SCHEMA : dbo ASIS_TABLE : CustAddress ( CUST_ADD_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustAddID , CUST_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustomerID , NRIC -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , TEL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Tel , FAX -- ASIS_COLUMN : Fax , STUS_CODE_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID , REM -- ASIS_COLUMN : Remark , UPD_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , UPD_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , ID_OLD -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , SO_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : SOID , IDCM -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDcm , CRT_USER_ID -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , CRT_DT -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , AREA_ID -- Area ID , ADDR_DTL -- Address Detail , STREET -- Street , ADD1 -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add1 , ADD2 -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add2 , ADD3 -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add3 , ADD4 -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add4 , POSTCODEID -- , POSTCODE -- , AREAID -- , AREA -- ASIS_COLUMN : Area , STATEID -- , COUNTRYID -- )VALUES( SAL0023D_CUST_ADD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustAddID , #{custId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : CustomerID , #{addressNric} -- ASIS_COLUMN : NRIC , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Tel , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Fax , 9 -- ASIS_COLUMN : StatusCodeID -- SYS0038M : 9(Main) , #{addressRem} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Remark , #{updUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Updated , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDOld , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : SOID , 0 -- ASIS_COLUMN : IDcm , #{crtUserId} -- ASIS_COLUMN : Creator , SYSDATE -- ASIS_COLUMN : Created , #{addressAreaId} -- Area ID , #{addressAddrDtl} -- Address Detail , #{addressStreet} -- Street , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add1 , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add2 , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add3 , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Add4 , NULL -- , NULL -- , NULL -- , NULL -- ASIS_COLUMN : Area , NULL -- , NULL -- )
